short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Organize tabs easily by dragging them into collections for different tasks. Quickly access saved groups for efficient browsing.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simplify tab organization by letting you drag and drop tabs into collections, making it easy to categorize and manage different projects or tasks. With quick access to saved collections, you can keep your browsing streamlined and efficient.
